name: It adds up
description:
Welcome to my third python project, It adds up.

The game is inspired by a french tv game, "Des chiffres et des lettres", where there is a mathematical mini-game called "Le compte est bon". In this game, you have six numbers at your disposal, and a random number between 100 and 999. You have to find a way to get the random number by adding, subtracting, multiplying or dividing them. In my game, I add the power and modulo operand to make it much more fun. You also can choose the maximum number of moves and time you want.

Warning: you cannot exceed 2000.
